Plot: The friendship between two young women who grew up in the same orphanage; one has found refuge at a convent in Romania and refuses to leave with her friend, who now lives in Germany.
Title: Beyond the Hills
Writer: Cristian Mungiu (screenplay), Tatiana Niculescu-Bran (inspired by non-fiction novels of)
Actors: Cosmina Stratan, Cristina Flutur, Valeriu Andriuta, Dana Tapalaga
tomatoConsensus: Although some viewers may mistake its deliberate pace for passionless filmmaking, Beyond the Hills offers an intelligent, powerfully acted examination of the tension between secular life and religious faith.
